title.narrative: Enhancing China's credit risk control through studying UK best practice.

description.narrative: This project is designed to help China's law-makers and financial regulators better understand the UK's approach to reducing pre-settlement credit risk, with the view to China adopting the UK's approach to these issues. This will reduce credit risk in China and bring the local market more in line with global best practice, enhancing financial stability and leading to poverty reduction through a more inclusive and sustainable Chinese economy. This will generate opportunities for international businesses in the Financial Services sector, bringing potential benefits to British companies in a sector where they are well placed to compete.
